query:
UPDATE clientes c
INNER JOIN produtos p ON c.id = p.clienteId
SET c.validationStatus = 'validated'
WHERE c.projectId = 1 
  AND c.pesquisaId = 1
  AND c.validationStatus = 'pending';
command:
